title: Push executor
description: Pushes the state of your Prisma schema file to the database without using migrations.

schema.description: The path to the prisma schema eg. 'prisma/schema.prisma'

skipGenerate.description: Skip generation of artifacts such as Prisma Client.

forceReset.description: Resets the database and then updates the schema - useful if you need to start from scratch due to unexecutable migrations.

acceptDataLoss.description: Ignore data loss warnings. This option is required if as a result of making the schema changes, data may be lost.
